Text: Great upload, a real classic. Apart from Julius Ceasar probably Brando's best performance.
This film is great, but Brando's best performance is Antony in Julius Caesar."For Brutus is an Honourable Man".Best.Acting.Ever.

How come all the rips of this film here on TPB are in 1.33:1, when it was filmed, and released, in 1.85:1?

Rather frustrating.
